name: Tales of Debteria
description:
Description:

Welcome to Debteria, a land where people work their lives off to settle mountains of debt. Play a magic school graduate who has to pay off her student loan by running errands for a tavern keeper. You will encounter zombie office workers, slave drivers, and tons of spilled coffee. Plus, you have to deal with taxes and random expenses. In true Senshi.Labs tradition, this is an educational fantasy-themed game that gives students a glimpse of what happens when you don't manage your finances well.

Features:

  • Enhance your basic skills with runes and equipment.
  • Fight zombie office workers and mutated spilled coffee.
  • Learn how to deal with random sources of stress.

Project Objective:

The game aims to illustrate what possible financial problems one might encounter when trying to live independently. 

Recommended Requirements:

OS: Windows 10 64bit
Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Processor 2 GHz or faster
Memory: 2GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7950

Minimum System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 64bit
Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Processor 1.3 GHz or faster
Memory: 1GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or ATI Radeon HD 5850 series
